properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the LayoutWindow.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the LayoutWindow (a Document).

properties.name: index
properties.description: The index of the LayoutWindow within its containing object.

properties.name: events
properties.description: A collection of events.

properties.name: eventListeners
properties.description: A collection of event listeners.

properties.name: viewDisplaySetting
properties.description: The display performance preferences override for the view.

properties.name: transformReferencePoint
properties.description: The default anchor point around which to transform objects. Can return: AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of 2 Units.

properties.name: activeLayer
properties.description: The active layer. Can also accept: String.

properties.name: zoomPercentage
properties.description: The size (as a percentage) to which to enlarge or reduce the view of the document. (Range: 5 to 4000)

properties.name: activeSpread
properties.description: The front-most spread. Can return: Spread or MasterSpread.

properties.name: activePage
properties.description: The front-most page.

properties.name: screenMode
properties.description: The screen mode for layout view.

properties.name: overprintPreview
properties.description: If true, display a simulation of overprinting.

properties.name: proofingProfile
properties.description: The profile used for proofing colors.

properties.name: proofingType
properties.description: The method of proofing colors.

properties.name: simulateInkBlack
properties.description: If true, simulates the dark gray produced by many printers in place of solid black, according to the proofing profile. Note: Valid only when proofing type is custom.

properties.name: simulatePaperWhite
properties.description: If true, simulates the dingy white of real paper, according to the proofing profile. Note: Valid only when proofing type is custom.

properties.name: preserveColorNumbers
properties.description: If true, leaves color values unchanged for CMYK objects without embedded profiles and native objects such as line art or type. Note: Converts images whose profiles differ from the profile of the simulated device. Valid only when proofing type is custom.

properties.name: selection
properties.description: The selected object(s). Can also accept: Object or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: The bounds of the window (specified in pixels) in the form [top, left, bottom, right].

properties.name: selectionKeyObject
properties.description: The key object of the selection. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: zoom
methods.description: Magnifies or reduces the window to the specified display size.

parameters.name: selectableItems
parameters.description: The objects to select. Can accept: Object, Array of Objects, NothingEnum enumerator or SelectAll enumerator.
The selection status of the LayoutWindow in relation to previously selected objects. (Optional)
parameters.name: existingSelection

methods.name: bringToFront
methods.description: Brings the object to the front.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the LayoutWindow.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

properties.description: Dispatched after the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_SELECTION_CHANGED

properties.description: Dispatched after an attribute on the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_SELECTION_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED

properties.description: Dispatched before the LayoutWindow becomes inactive. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_DEACTIVATE

properties.description: Dispatched after the LayoutWindow becomes active. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_ACTIVATE

properties.description: Dispatched when the value of a property changes on this LayoutWindow. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED

properties.description: Dispatched after a LayoutWindow is opened. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_OPEN

properties.description: Dispatched before a LayoutWindow is closed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.
properties.name: BEFORE_CLOSE

properties.description: Dispatched when a LayoutWindow is closing. Since the close has been committed, it can no longer be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_CLOSE
